channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AZ
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AZ

item.title: Report X-2024030160
item.description:
Report X-2024030160

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-12T15:28:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-25
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: content was unloaded off of tugger. due to possible leakage manger notified QA to inspect package. DescribePack: after closer inspection found white powder under internal container DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: lid and seal needed to be inspected better by shipper

item.title: Report X-2024030072
item.description:
Report X-2024030072

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-08T18:13:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-28
  • City: GOODYEAR
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER RECEIVED A CALL FOR A LEAKING PACKAGE ON THE UNLOAD WALL. UPON ARRIVAL, IDENTIFIED THE LEAKING PACKAGE. PLACED SAID PACKAGE IN SPILL TRAY FOR TRANPORT. TRANSPORTED TO DMP AREA FOR PROPER DISPOSAL.

item.title: Report X-2024021778
item.description:
Report X-2024021778

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-07T15:11:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-22
  • City: CHANDLER
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The box was punctured and a small amount of the product was on the outside of the box. The spill clearly came from one bottle, but the missing liquid is negligible. DescribePack: The hole in the side is about an inch by an inch, DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed into a red hazmat tote.

item.title: Report X-2024021729
item.description:
Report X-2024021729

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-19
  • City: GOODYEAR
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was loaded into a trailer on the way to station 869 were it was found damaged from being improperly loaded DescribePack: There is a small puncture on the bottom of the can where the contents slowly seeped out of. DurationRel: 20 and MitigateEffect: To put the hazmat in a hazmat bag and box to minimalize leakage
